description:
**Tool Overview**:

A comprehensive resource for managing registry keys and Group Policy settings related to Microsoft Edge. This tool is integral for system administrators aiming to configure browser behavior or enforce security policies across multiple endpoints in an enterprise environment.

***Details***

The tool allows administrators to adjust settings within the Windows registry that control Microsoft Edge functionalities. It can be deployed through scripted solutions or integrated into broader configuration management systems such as Configuration Manager or Intune. Detailed instructions for implementation and configurations can be found in the referenced KB articles. The detailed explanation for this Tool is provided in the Fix description.
